title: Introduction to HTML
description: Understand the structure of a webpage and start building with HTML elements and tags.

title: HTML Forms and Media
description: Learn to create interactive forms and embed images, audio, and video.

title: Semantic HTML
description: Structure your content using semantic elements for better accessibility and SEO.

title: Introduction to CSS
description: Style your pages using CSS selectors, properties, and colors.

title: CSS Box Model & Positioning
description: Understand margin, padding, borders, and how elements are positioned on the page.

title: CSS Flexbox
description: Create flexible and responsive layouts using the Flexbox model.

title: CSS Grid
description: Design complex grid-based layouts with ease using CSS Grid.

title: CSS Transitions and Animations
description: Bring your UI to life with smooth transitions and basic animations.

title: Responsive Design with Media Queries
description: Make your website mobile-friendly using responsive CSS techniques.

title: Introduction to JavaScript
description: Learn JavaScript syntax, variables, data types, and basic operations.

title: JavaScript DOM Manipulation
description: Interact with web pages dynamically using the Document Object Model (DOM).

title: JavaScript Events & Functions
description: Handle user input, write reusable functions, and control program flow.

title: JavaScript Arrays & Objects
description: Work with structured data using arrays, objects, and loops.

title: Bootstrap Fundamentals
description: Learn Bootstrapâ€™s grid system, typography, and responsive utilities.

title: Bootstrap Components and Customization
description: Use Bootstrap components like modals and navbars, and customize themes.
